page.title: 15 BUSINESSES IN AYNHO
page.content: There are 2 {PUBLIC HOUSES} in Aynho. The CARTWRIGHT ARMS is an old coaching inn in the village. You can sleep there and eat in the restaurant as well as drink .The GREAT WESTERN ARMS is down by the old station and only sells beer. Down by the old station are 2 {COAL MERCHANTS} . They deliver coal to all the villages in the area. Behind the Cartwright Arms is a {CAR REPAIR} business run by 1 man in a barn There are 3 men who drive {LORRIES} and carry grain, bricks and general goods. The {BOATYARD} is situated down at the canal near the old station. You can hire boats to cruise on the canals. There are 2 small {BUILDING FIRMS} and one specialises in stonework.
